description: Create a new GTP service object.

headers.name: Content-Type
headers.description: Send JSON object to use the API Web Services

headers.name: X-chkp-sid
headers.description: Session unique identifier as it returned by the login request

body.name: name
body.description: Object name. Must be unique in the domain.

body.name: apn
body.description: The Access Point Name object identified by Name or UID.

body.name: allow-usage-of-static-ip
body.description: Allow usage of static IP addresses.

body.name: add-imsi-field-to-log
body.description: Add IMSI field to logs generated by user traffic.

body.name: cs-fallback-and-srvcc
body.description: CS Fallback and SRVCC (Relevant for V2 only).

body.name: profile
body.description: The Interface Profile object identified by Name or UID.

body.name: custom-message-types
body.description: The messages types to match on them for this service. To specify a range, add a hyphen between the lowest and the highest numbers, for example: 32-35. Multiple Ranges can be chosen when separated with comma. This field relevant only when the Interface profile is set to 'Custom'.

body.name: group
body.description: The Ldap Group object identified by Name or UID.

body.name: according-to
body.description: According to MS-ISDN or according to IMSI.

body.name: types
body.description: Other RAT Types. To specify other RAT ranges, add a hyphen between the lowest and the highest numbers, for example: 11-15. Multiple Ranges can be chosen when separated with comma.

body.name: restoration-and-recovery
body.description: Restoration and Recovery (Relevant for V2 only).

body.name: reverse-service
body.description: Accept PDUs from the GGSN/PGW to the SGSN/SGW on a previously established PDP context, even if different ports are used.

body.name: mode
body.description: The mode as integer. [0 - Verified, 1 - MS - Not verified, 2 - Network - Not verified].

success.name: name
success.description: Object name. Must be unique in the domain.

success.name: name
success.description: Object name. Must be unique in the domain.

success.name: color
success.description: Color of the object. Should be one of existing colors.
